name: Hope & Despair
description:
Hope & Despair

Premise: You are the last of your kind that has not been corrupted. You have been given the ability to change them for either the better or the worst. But the question is will you save them or kill them?

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Movement

Z Key - Hope Shot

X Key - Despair Shot

Credit:

Programmer: Larry Popper & Donald Malone

Artist: Donald Malone

Level Design: Larry Popper

Audio/Music: Ozzed.net & jfxr.frozenfractal.com
